data.text: @NadaNashif @UNHumanRights Sec General Antonio Guterres of the UN can RESOLVE the Ukrainian problem. SEC GUTERRES SHOULD BE IN KYIV/MOSCOW SHUTTLING FOR PEACE/NOT WAR.
